text:
correct <@U06LHL57QLA> - yes I tried looking myself to see if it can be done through one api call but did not find a way neither.

What I suggest when looping through the results from the search api - gather the ticket ids into one array and do one Bulk Read API call with all Ticket IDs you get after the looping.

So in total you have 2 APIs for each batch. One Search API and One Bulk Read API. All is documented on official  HubSpot documentation

We have the following case:
1. Use form to create a ticket
2. If ticket is created trigger webhook
How to get via api the form submission (or submission ID) that is connected to ticket?

With Operations Pro/Enterprise, you could do this in a ticket-based workflow.

Without Operations Pro/Enterprise, you would need to create a Private App and then subscribe to a 'ticket created' webhook. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/create-and-edit-webhook-subscriptions-in-private-apps>
Hello, I have one subject with a private App for one of my customers: <https://www.loom.com/share/352bd5d2ba324375ab29c3e4b440cfab?sid=f349237f-ac72-4879-8dc8-e5ae7d46ac7e>

Hi Team
Do we have any information about the HubSpot Invoice API? Currently, we can only find the GET, Search API for invoices.
Do we need to obtain any permissions or take any additional steps? Please advise.

Thanks

I'm using this app, but I can't get the first and last name, per user
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/users?limit=100&archived=false&properties=hs_additional_phone,hs_job_title>
You arenâ€™t crazy. Right now the team has only released : <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/commerce/invoices>

From the User API docs it doesn't look like those properties are available in that API.  But you **could* take a user ID and get that info from the Owners API I believe.  You have to set the idProperty to userId which lets you give the User ID as input rather than the Owner ID <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/owners>
the problem when using that endpoint I can't get the <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/users?limit=100&archived=false&properties=hs_additional_phone,hs_job_title|hs_job_title>

Hey I'm trying to intergate my website to HubSpot. so when someone signup goes directly to my CRM & i want to connect the live chat feature as well. thanks. take in consideration my website is custom code using reactnative
